text: The central bank published its quarterly stability report, noting that mid-sized lenders reduced commercial real-estate exposure by 18 percent while deposit growth stayed flat.

Engineers at the orbital operations center uploaded a corrective patch to the weather satellite after discovering jitter in the gyroscope telemetry collected during last week's storm over the Pacific.
City council members approved a two-year pilot that lets emergency crews pre-load wildfire evacuation notices into a secure messaging queue, cutting dispatch time from six minutes to ninety seconds.
